text: 7|86|haey puok anak min trauv angkouy now tam dangophlauv  daembi koumream kamheng  ning reareang anak del mean chomnue leu a l laoh ampi meakra robsa trong  daoy puok anak svengork meakra min troemotrauv noh te .  haey chaur  puok anak changcha.  nowpel del puok anak mean knea tech  haey trong ban  thveu aoy puok anak mean knea rutte chraen .  chaur puok anak meul choh.  tae lotthophl  chongokraoy robsa puok lmeusa noh yeangna der
